Invocation Name: show widgets
des:
Get the most of your smart display with widgets from ShowWidgets™.

Try:
- Daily Treasure: Each day open the treasure chest to discover a new surprise.
- Magic Ball: Need answers to questions? Shake the Magic Ball.
- Word Clock: Get this beautiful word clock accurate to 5 minutes.
- Coin Flip: Heads or tails? Flip to find out.
- Pixel Artist: You are the artist. The widget is your canvas.

Follow the instructions in the skill to find and install any of the quality widgets:
1. Find ShowWidgets™ widgets in the Widgets Gallery by swiping from the right side on your supported Echo Show device
2. Tap the widget to learn more
3. Tap the "Add Widget" button

The widget will be added to your Favorite Widget panel.

It's that easy.
